level.heading: DEFINITIONS (ยง 19-1499) As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise indicates, the followingerms and phrases shall have the meaning ascribed: Mechanical amusement machine – any machine, device, or appliance, exceptusic machine, offered for use by the public, as a game, entertainment, ormusement, whether or not registering a score, and irrespective of whether orot the element of skill in the operation thereof predominates over the elementf luck, which may be operated or caused to operate by the insertion of a coin,lug, token, plate or disk; provided that nothing in this regulation shall beonstrued to authorize, license, or permit the display or use of any gamblingevice whatsoever, or any mechanism which has been or may be judiciallyetermined to be a gambling device. Mayor – the Mayor of the District of Columbia. Video Arcade – any commercial establishment whose primary business is theperation of ten or more mechanical amusement machines.
